ygData.subject: Re: To the Pod
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She nodded in agreement. I wonder sometimes how the Predacons survive since they only look out for themselves and not each other. She walked on with him.

She nodded in agreement. "I wonder sometimes how the Predacons 
survive since they only look out for themselves and not each other."

She walked on with him. She chuckled, "You know, I changed sides, I 
wonder if there are others who would like to do the same thing, but 
are afraid to? Makes you wonder a little doesn't it?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus nods, looking ahead of him. "Sounds bad. If we Maximals 
didn't look 
> out for one another, we wouldn't be here right now."
> 
> He looks ahead of him, realizing that that was the truth. The years 
of the 
> Neo Beast Wars had been hard on the Maximals, nearing them to 
extinction more 
> than once. But they had survived, through every fall they had taken.
